pageContext.claim: “Ex-FBI LAYER Lisa Page today defied a House of Representatives issued Subpoena to testify before Congress! Wow, but is anybody really surprised! Together with her lover, FBI Agent Peter Strzok, she worked on the Rigged Witch Hunt, perhaps the most tainted and corrupt case EVER!”
pageContext.analysis: Page defied a subpoena but voluntarily answered lawmakers' questions in private days later. Rep. Mark Meadows, a conservative Republican, praised her performance and said she had been "falsely accused" of not wanting to cooperate with the House intelligence committee. There's no evidence that the special counsel investigation is a witch hunt or a hoax. In fact, the special counsel has revealed significant criminal activity by some of Trump's campaign advisers and by Russian individuals and entities. The investigation into potential collusion between Russia and Trump's campaign continues, and no conclusions have been announced.
